item.title: Forward Cargo A/C Overboard Check Valve

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided forward Cargo Air Conditioning is not used.

numlitem.para: Carriage of animals, or perishables is prohibited in the forward cargo compartment.

placard.para: Placard Cargo Cond Air Flow Rate selector "DO NOT OPERATE". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Position the LOWER LOBE CARGO COND AIR FLOW RATE selector to OFF, LOW AFT, or HIGH AFT as required.
